meanings.sent1: The zookeeper counted the rhinoceri in the enclosure.
meanings.sent2: A herd of rhinoceri grazed peacefully in the savannah.
meanings.sent3: The rhinoceri decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The rhinoceri in the room were as unstoppable as a charging bull.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the rhinoceri stampeding left a lasting impression on the spectators.

meanings.sent1: The rhinoceri gathered at the watering hole for a drink.
meanings.sent2: We observed a family of rhinoceri moving through the grasslands.
meanings.sent3: The rhinoceri held a meeting to discuss their next migration.
meanings.sent4: The rhinoceri stood together like an impenetrable fortress.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the rhinoceri's footsteps echoed through the valley.
